name: products-grid
description: Build a grid of product items and ads

scripts.start: webpack --mode development && json-server server/index.js --routes server/routes.json --middlewares server/handle-delay.js server/handle-ads.js
scripts.build: webpack --mode production && json-server server/index.js --routes server/routes.json --middlewares server/handle-delay.js server/handle-ads.js

author: Abhilash Thakur
